title: Lipie, Częstochowa County
text:
Lipie is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20D%C4%85browa%20Zielona">Gmina Dąbrowa Zielona</a>, within <a href="Cz%C4%99stochowa%20County">Częstochowa County</a>, <a href="Silesian%20Voivodeship">Silesian Voivodeship</a>, in southern Poland. It lies approximately west of <a href="D%C4%85browa%20Zielona">Dąbrowa Zielona</a>, east of <a href="Cz%C4%99stochowa">Częstochowa</a>, and north-east of the regional capital <a href="Katowice">Katowice</a>.
The village has a population of 49.
References.
